remarks: A subspace covered by an atom must be the zero subspace.  ( ~ atcveq0 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lsatcveq0.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatcveq0.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lsatcveq0.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatcveq0.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
lsatcveq0.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lsatcveq0.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lsatcveq0.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lsatcveq0 $p |- ( ph -> ( U C Q <-> U = { .0. } ) ) $.
